channel.title: CLKR Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
• 8 new mechanical keyboard sound profiles: MX Blue, MX Brown, MX Black, Cream, Turquoise, Mech Classic, Mech Deep, Mech Sharp
  • Theme contrast fixes — tabs and buttons now readable in all themes
  • Focus tab scroll fix — no more jumping to top when clicking sounds
  • ON/OFF toggle now stops ambient sounds too
  • Click version number to check for updates manually
  • Hourly automatic update checks

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
• Full theme system — themes change entire app appearance
  • Ambient sounds: brown noise, pink noise, rain, ocean, campfire, cafe, forest
  • Harder level and achievement progression
  • Volume controls at top of Focus and Sounds tabs
  • Auto-updates via Sparkle
